meanings.definition: The action of circulating or flowing again.
meanings.sent1: The recirculation of water in the fish tank helps keep the fish healthy.
meanings.sent2: The recirculation of air in the room ensures proper ventilation.
meanings.sent3: The recirculation of jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The recirculation of ideas in the meeting sparked creativity.
meanings.sent5: The recirculation of blood in the body is vital for survival.

meanings.definition: The process of reusing or reprocessing something.
meanings.sent1: Recirculation of plastic helps reduce waste in the environment.
meanings.sent2: The recirculation of old newspapers into new products is eco-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The recirculation of clothes at the thrift store benefits many people.
meanings.sent4: Recirculation of materials in the factory saves resources and money.
meanings.sent5: The recirculation of knowledge through teaching is valuable for society.
